Summary: This Hearthstone Priest deck revolves around powerful removal spells and resurrecting minions with strong Deathrattle effects.
Strategy: The strategy of this deck is to control the board with spells and minions, then capitalize on reviving resilient minions to outlast and overwhelm your opponent.
